commitResults.messageTitle: Implement Level 0 chatbot with rename, greet, and exit
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed Duke to Cate and removed all references to the old name. Added a
skeletal version that greets the user on start and exits gracefully. This
establishes the base structure for future levels of the chatbot.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level 1 echo feature to Cate
commitResults.messageBody:
Cate now echoes user input and exits only when 'bye' is entered.
Horizontal lines separate messages for clarity in the console output.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level 2 task storage and listing to Cate
commitResults.messageBody:
Cate can now store user input as tasks and list them on command.
Tasks are kept in memory with a fixed-size array of up to 100 items.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to mark tasks as done and undone
commitResults.messageBody: Create a task class to represent tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for tracking three types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
* ToDos: tasks without any date/time attached to it
* Deadlines: tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time
* Events: tasks that start at a specific date/time and ends at a specific date/time

* When user input does not match any command
* When user inputs todo without description

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for deleting tasks from the list
